game.title: The Lost Temple
game.objective: Retrieve the ancient relic from the lost temple.
game.description: A local villager has gone missing while exploring a long-abandoned temple deep in the jungle. The villagers suspect that the temple is cursed, but you have a feeling that something more sinister is at play. Your mission is to find the missing villager and uncover the secrets of the lost temple.

task.objective: Find the entrance to the lost temple.
task.description: The villagers told you that the temple is hidden deep in the jungle, and only a local guide can lead you there. Ask around the village to find someone who knows the way.
Once you're inside, navigate through the dusty corridors and ancient chambers. Be careful not to trigger any traps or alarms.
After exploring the temple, you'll find a pedestal with the ancient relic on top. Be prepared for a surprise as you take it down.
With the relic in hand, make your way back out of the temple. But beware - the villagers' curse may be stronger than you think!
